class.rdfs:comment: A service provided by an organization, e.g. delivery service, print services, etc.
class.rdfs:label: Service

schema:aggregateRating.rdfs:comment: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
schema:aggregateRating.rdfs:label: aggregateRating

schema:areaServed.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
schema:areaServed.rdfs:label: areaServed

schema:audience.rdfs:comment: An intended audience, i.e. a group for whom something was created.
schema:audience.rdfs:label: audience

schema:availableChannel.rdfs:comment: A means of accessing the service (e.g. a phone bank, a web site, a location, etc.).
schema:availableChannel.rdfs:label: availableChannel

schema:award.rdfs:comment: An award won by or for this item.
schema:award.rdfs:label: award

schema:brand.rdfs:comment: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.
schema:brand.rdfs:label: brand

schema:broker.rdfs:comment: An entity that arranges for an exchange between a buyer and a seller.  In most cases a broker never acquires or releases ownership of a product or service involved in an exchange.  If it is not clear whether an entity is a broker, seller, or buyer, the latter two terms are preferred.
schema:broker.rdfs:label: broker

schema:category.rdfs:comment: A category for the item. Greater signs or slashes can be used to informally indicate a category hierarchy.
schema:category.rdfs:label: category

schema:hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:comment: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.
schema:hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:label: hasOfferCatalog

schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:comment: The hours during which this service or contact is available.
schema:hoursAvailable.rdfs:label: hoursAvailable

schema:isRelatedTo.rdfs:comment: A pointer to another, somehow related product (or multiple products).
schema:isRelatedTo.rdfs:label: isRelatedTo

schema:isSimilarTo.rdfs:comment: A pointer to another, functionally similar product (or multiple products).
schema:isSimilarTo.rdfs:label: isSimilarTo

schema:offers.rdfs:comment: An offer to provide this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, rent the DVD of a movie, perform a service, or give away tickets to an event.
schema:offers.rdfs:label: offers

schema:produces.rdfs:comment: The tangible thing generated by the service, e.g. a passport, permit, etc.
schema:produces.rdfs:label: produces

schema:provider.rdfs:comment: The service provider, service operator, or service performer; the goods producer. Another party (a seller) may offer those services or goods on behalf of the provider. A provider may also serve as the seller.
schema:provider.rdfs:label: provider

schema:providerMobility.rdfs:comment: Indicates the mobility of a provided service (e.g. 'static', 'dynamic').
schema:providerMobility.rdfs:label: providerMobility

schema:serviceArea.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where the service is provided.
schema:serviceArea.rdfs:label: serviceArea

schema:serviceAudience.rdfs:comment: The audience eligible for this service.
schema:serviceAudience.rdfs:label: serviceAudience

schema:serviceOutput.rdfs:comment: The tangible thing generated by the service, e.g. a passport, permit, etc.
schema:serviceOutput.rdfs:label: serviceOutput

schema:serviceType.rdfs:comment: The type of service being offered, e.g. veterans' benefits, emergency relief, etc.
schema:serviceType.rdfs:label: serviceType
